name: Get Repair Suggestions
description: Get AI-powered repair suggestions for component errors. Analyzes errors and provides actionable fixes with reasoning. Can optionally attempt automatic fixes for common issues.

componentId.description: The ID of the component with the error (e.g., 'form-1', 'table-results')

errorMessage.description: The error message or description of the issue

errorType.description: Type of error if known. Helps provide more targeted suggestions.

includeContext.description: Include component state and props in analysis for better suggestions

autoFix.description: Attempt to automatically fix the issue if a safe auto-fix is available

maxSuggestions.description: Maximum number of suggestions to return
